<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## average() function

Returns the average of the given (Iterable/AsyncIterable) (mean)

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function average<T extends Iterable<number> | AsyncIterable<number>>(iterable: T): ReturnValueType<T>;
```



## Example


```ts
average([]); // NaN
average([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]); // 3
await average(toAsync([1, 2, 3, 4, 5])); // 3

// with pipe
pipe(
 [1, 2, 3, 4, 5],
 average,
); // 3
```
see [pipe](https://fxts.dev/docs/pipe)


[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/average.ts)
